Description: Pottery amphora: with a pointed base and convex sides, with two handles near the top; the neck is incomplete. One side is inscribed with hieratic script in black paint, and the other incised with a hieroglyph.
Bibliographic references: Parkinson 1999 / Cracking Codes: The Rosetta Stone and Decipherment (19)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
